text: Arau sihamte allahaka yathocita sanmana karaa na'i athaca kiyamatara dina gote'i prthirai thakiba te'omra hatara muthita arau akasasamuha te'omra som hatata meraiya'i thoraa arasthata thakiba. Paraitra arau mahana te'om, sihamte yiboraka ansisthapana karae te'om se'iborara paraa bahu urd'dhata
